languages.text: {n}Лошадь фыркает и обнажает крупные зубы. Непонятно, что обычно жрет эта тварь, но она точно не против закусить вашими пальцами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: М-м, кажется она плотоядная — и очень-очень голодная. А еще, кажется, она не прочь закусить нами.

languages.text: {n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лошадь фыркает и обнажает крупные зубы. Непонятно, что обычно жрет эта тварь, но она точно не против закусить вашими пальцами.{/n}

{n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}
{n}The horse snorts and bares its long, pointed teeth. It is unclear exactly what species this thing belongs to, but it certainly does not live off grass. No, you are the perfect morsel for it.{/n}
{n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这匹马一边喷着气，一边对你露出了硕大的牙齿。尽管你不知道这种生物平时以什么为食，但现在，它肯定很乐意把你的手指当成小饼干啃个干净。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这匹马一边喷着气，一边对你露出了硕大的牙齿。尽管你不知道这种生物平时以什么为食，但现在，它肯定很乐意把你的手指当成小饼干啃个干净。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El caballo resopla y te enseña su amplia dentadura. Ignoras de qué se alimentará habitualmente esta criatura, pero ahora mismo parece dispuesta a roerte los dedos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El caballo resopla y te enseña su amplia dentadura. Ignoras de qué se alimentará habitualmente esta criatura, pero ahora mismo parece dispuesta a roerte los dedos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}At, homurdanıp iri dişlerini gösteriyor. Bu yaratığın normalde neyle beslendiği belli değil ama şu an parmaklarını kemirmekten pek memnun olacağı aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At, homurdanıp iri dişlerini gösteriyor. Bu yaratığın normalde neyle beslendiği belli değil ama şu an parmaklarını kemirmekten pek memnun olacağı aşikâr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}馬は鼻を鳴らし、その大きな歯をあなたに見せる。この生き物が普段どんな餌を与えられていたのかはわからないが、今なら、喜んであなたの指をムシャムシャと食べるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}馬は鼻を鳴らし、その大きな歯をあなたに見せる。この生き物が普段どんな餌を与えられていたのかはわからないが、今なら、喜んであなたの指をムシャムシャと食べるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cheval renâcle en découvrant ses énormes dents. Qui sait de quoi cette créature se nourrit habituellement ? Mais en cet instant, elle se contenterait sans doute de croquer quelques-uns de vos doigts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse snorts and shows you its large teeth. It is unclear what this creature usually feeds on, but right now, it would happily munch on your fingers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Pferd schnaubt und entblößt seine großen Zähne. Es ist unklar, was dieses Tier üblicherweise frisst, aber im Augenblick würde es liebend gern an deinen Fingern nagen.{/n}
